local_intent: Approach and align to the T-block for stable pushing contact
assumptions: t_block can be re-detected if not currently visible
Approach tolerances of 0.01 are sufficient for pushing contact
coherence_with_global: Perceives the block (with retry), executes ApproachAndAlign with tolerance 0.01 and timeout 1200, then verifies proximity via IsAt before subsequent yaw setting and pushes in the global tree.
